homens.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?item_qid ?item_label ?date_modified (SAMPLE(?imagem) AS ?imagem) WHERE { SERVICE wikibase:label {bd:serviceParam wikibase:language 'LANGUAGE, pt-br,pt,en,es,fr,de'. ?item rdfs:label ?item_label. ?retrata rdfs:label  ?retrata_label.} VALUES ?retrata {wd:Q8441 wd:Q3010 wd:Q9238344 wd:Q177232} ?item wdt:P195 wd:Q56677470. ?item wdt:P18 ?imagem_. ?item wdt:P180 ?retrata. ?item schema:dateModified ?date_modified. BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?item),32) AS ?item_qid) BIND(REPLACE(wikibase:decodeUri(STR(?imagem_)), 'http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/', '') as ?imagem) } GROUP BY ?item_qid ?item_label ?date_modified ORDER BY ASC(?date_modified)

BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?item),32) AS ?item_qid) BIND(REPLACE(wikibase:decodeUri(STR(?imagem_)), 'http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/', '') as ?imagem) } GROUP BY ?item_qid ?item_label ?date_modified ORDER BY ASC(?date_modified)

BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?item),32) AS ?item_qid) BIND(REPLACE(wikibase:decodeUri(STR(?imagem_)), 'http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/', '') as ?imagem) } GROUP BY ?item_qid ?item_label ?date_modified ORDER BY ASC(?date_modified)

BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?item),32) AS ?item_qid) BIND(REPLACE(wikibase:decodeUri(STR(?imagem_)), 'http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/', '') as ?imagem) } GROUP BY ?item_qid ?item_label ?date_modified ORDER BY ASC(?date_modified)

nacionalidades.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?item_qid ?item_label ?date_modified (SAMPLE(?imagem) AS ?imagem) WHERE { SERVICE wikibase:label {bd:serviceParam wikibase:language 'LANGUAGE, pt-br,pt,en,es,fr,de'. ?item rdfs:label ?item_label. ?retrata rdfs:label  ?retrata_label.} ?item wdt:P195 wd:Q56677470. ?item wdt:P18 ?imagem_. ?item wdt:P180 ?retrata. ?retrata wdt:P31 wd:Q231002. ?item schema:dateModified ?date_modified. BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?item),32) AS ?item_qid) BIND(REPLACE(wikibase:decodeUri(STR(?imagem_)), 'http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/', '') as ?imagem) } GROUP BY ?item_qid ?item_label ?date_modified ORDER BY ASC(?date_modified)

BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?item),32) AS ?item_qid) BIND(REPLACE(wikibase:decodeUri(STR(?imagem_)), 'http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/', '') as ?imagem) } GROUP BY ?item_qid ?item_label ?date_modified ORDER BY ASC(?date_modified)

BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?item),32) AS ?item_qid) BIND(REPLACE(wikibase:decodeUri(STR(?imagem_)), 'http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/', '') as ?imagem) } GROUP BY ?item_qid ?item_label ?date_modified ORDER BY ASC(?date_modified)

pessoas_conhecidas.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?item_qid ?item_label ?date_modified (SAMPLE(?imagem) AS ?imagem) WHERE { SERVICE wikibase:label {bd:serviceParam wikibase:language 'LANGUAGE, pt-br,pt,en,es,fr,de'. ?item rdfs:label ?item_label. ?retrata rdfs:label  ?retrata_label.} ?item wdt:P195 wd:Q56677470. ?item wdt:P18 ?imagem_. ?item wdt:P180 ?retrata. ?retrata wdt:P31 wd:Q5. ?item schema:dateModified ?date_modified. BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?item),32) AS ?item_qid) BIND(REPLACE(wikibase:decodeUri(STR(?imagem_)), 'http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/', '') as ?imagem) } GROUP BY ?item_qid ?item_label ?date_modified ORDER BY ASC(?date_modified)

tudo.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?item_qid ?item_label ?date_modified (SAMPLE(?imagem) AS ?imagem) WHERE { SERVICE wikibase:label {bd:serviceParam wikibase:language 'LANGUAGE, pt-br,pt,en,es,fr,de'. ?item rdfs:label ?item_label. ?retrata rdfs:label  ?retrata_label.} ?item wdt:P195 wd:Q56677470. ?item wdt:P18 ?imagem_. ?item wdt:P180 ?retrata. ?retrata wdt:P279* wd:Q795052. ?item schema:dateModified ?date_modified. BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?item),32) AS ?item_qid) BIND(REPLACE(wikibase:decodeUri(STR(?imagem_)), 'http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/', '') as ?imagem) } GROUP BY ?item_qid ?item_label ?date_modified ORDER BY ASC(?date_modified)

Metadados.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?obra_qid ?obra_label ?obra_descr (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT(CONCAT(?instancia_qid,'@',?instancia_label));separator=';') AS ?instancia) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT(CONCAT(?criador_qid,'@',?criador_label));separator=';') AS ?criador) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT(CONCAT(?material_qid,'@',?material_label));separator=';') AS ?material) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT(CONCAT(?encomendador_qid,'@',?encomendador_label));separator=';') AS ?encomendador) (SAMPLE(?imagem) AS ?imagem) (SAMPLE(?audio) AS ?audio) (SAMPLE(?data) AS ?data) WHERE { SERVICE wikibase:label {bd:serviceParam wikibase:language 'LANGUAGE,pt-br,pt,en,es,fr,de'. ?instancia_ rdfs:label ?instancia_label. ?criador_ rdfs:label ?criador_label. ?obra rdfs:label ?obra_label. ?obra schema:description ?obra_descr. ?material_ rdfs:label ?material_label. ?encomendador_ rdfs:label ?encomendador_label.} BIND(wd:QIDDAOBRA AS ?obra) BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?obra), 32 ) AS ?obra_qid) Optional {?obra wdt:P18 ?imagem_.} BIND(IF(BOUND(?imagem_),REPLACE(wikibase:decodeUri(STR(?imagem_)), 'http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/', ''),'Calaamad suaal.png') as ?imagem) {?obra wdt:P989 ?audio_. BIND(REPLACE(wikibase:decodeUri(STR(?audio_)), 'http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:FilePath/', '') as ?audio)} UNION {?obra wdt:P31 ?instancia_. BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?instancia_), 32 ) AS ?instancia_qid)} UNION {?obra wdt:P170 ?criador_. BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?criador_), 32 ) AS ?criador_qid)} UNION {?obra wdt:P571 ?data_; (p:P571/psv:P571) ?data_aux. ?data_aux wikibase:timeValue ?data_value; wikibase:timePrecision ?data_precision. BIND(CONCAT(STR(YEAR(?data_value)), '-', STR(MONTH(?data_value)), '-', STR(DAY(?data_value)), '-', STR(?data_precision)) AS ?data)}  UNION {?obra wdt:P186 ?material_. BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?material_), 32 ) AS ?material_qid)} UNION {?obra wdt:P88 ?encomendador_. BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?encomendador_), 32 ) AS ?encomendador_qid)} } GROUP BY ?obra_qid ?obra_label ?obra_descr ?instancia ?criador ?material ?encomendador

Retratas.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?retrata_stat_id ?retrata_qid ?retrata_label ?retrata_descr (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT(?veste_aux); SEPARATOR = ';%;') AS ?veste) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT(?usa_aux); SEPARATOR = ';%;') AS ?usa) WITH { SELECT DISTINCT ?retrata_stat_id ?retrata_qid ?retrata_label ?retrata_descr ?veste_qid ?veste_label ?veste_descr ?usa_qid ?usa_label ?usa_descr WHERE { BIND(wd:Q97989410 AS ?obra) BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?obra), 32 ) AS ?obra_qid) OPTIONAL { ?obra p:P180 ?retrata_aux. ?retrata_aux ps:P180 ?retrata_. { ?retrata_ wdt:P31 wd:Q231002. } UNION { ?retrata_ wdt:P31 wd:Q41710. } UNION { ?retrata_ wdt:P31 wd:Q12737077. } UNION { ?retrata_ wdt:P31 wd:Q5. } UNION { VALUES ?retrata_ { wd:Q8441 wd:Q3010 wd:Q9238344 wd:Q177232 wd:Q467 wd:Q7560 wd:Q308194 wd:Q9235758 wd:Q7569 wd:Q998 wd:Q3010 wd:Q3031 wd:Q9238344 wd:Q9235758 wd:Q191089 } ?obra wdt:P180 ?retrata_. } BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?retrata_aux), 42 ) AS ?retrata_stat_id) BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?retrata_), 32 ) AS ?retrata_qid) OPTIONAL { ?retrata_aux pq:P3828 ?veste_. BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?veste_), 32 ) AS ?veste_qid) } OPTIONAL { ?retrata_aux pq:P2283 ?usa_. BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?usa_), 32 ) AS ?usa_qid) } } SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language 'pt-br,pt'. ?retrata_ rdfs:label ?retrata_label; schema:description ?retrata_descr. ?veste_ rdfs:label ?veste_label; schema:description ?veste_descr. ?usa_ rdfs:label ?usa_label; schema:description ?usa_descr. } } GROUP BY ?obra ?obra_qid ?retrata_ ?retrata_stat_id ?retrata_qid ?retrata_label ?retrata_descr ?veste_qid ?veste_label ?veste_descr ?usa_qid ?usa_label ?usa_descr } AS %resultados WHERE { INCLUDE %resultados. BIND(CONCAT(?veste_qid, '@', IF(BOUND(?veste_label),?veste_label,''), '@', IF(BOUND(?veste_descr),?veste_descr,'')) AS ?veste_aux) BIND(CONCAT(?usa_qid, '@', IF(BOUND(?usa_label),?usa_label,''), '@', IF(BOUND(?usa_descr),?usa_descr,'')) AS ?usa_aux) } GROUP BY ?obra ?obra_qid ?retrata_ ?retrata_stat_id ?retrata_qid ?retrata_label ?retrata_descr
